nodes.text: Q-Z5 was a probe droid affiliated with the Sith Empire and stationed near canyons on Ossus during the Invasion of Ossus.

The droid's primary programming was to track the enemy data flow and provide the Imperial strike teams with personnel recordings. This task was fulfilled during an assault on the enemy's communications control bunker, rewarding the Imperials with intel on the Jedi's and colonist's troop movements.
